# contentImage

**Instance Property**

The image displayed in the main content view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The content image is displayed in the caption button and indicates the purpose of the caption button. The last instance of [doc://com.apple.tvuikit/documentation/TVUIKit/TVCaptionButtonView/contentImage] or [doc://com.apple.tvuikit/documentation/TVUIKit/TVCaptionButtonView/contentText] that was set in your app is displayed by the caption button view.

## Configuring the Caption Button

- **contentText**: The text displayed in the main content view.
- **title**: The title for the caption button.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle of the caption button.
